title: Font ID help.
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081021154434im_/http:/typophile.com/files/470x470_6656.jpeg)

its not “impact”. and im aware the grunge was more than likely added.  
but im looking for the exact font.

for another example.  
theelectriczombie.com/

its the font that says STORE/CLOTHING.  
let me know please.

 [‹ Brayco logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081021154434/http:/typophile.com/node/50711 "Go to previous forum topic") [HELP identifying lp artwork font! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081021154434/http:/typophile.com/node/50716 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nickglory
